openChannel

protected abstract int openChannel(int portHint,
                                   java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Commands> q)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Parameters:
portHint - the port to use or 0 to let the system choose a port.
q - receives commands from the outside.
Returns:
the port opened
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if a port could not be opened. Always thrown if a port other than 0 was specified and it could not be acquired.

makeToken

@Nonnull
protected abstract java.lang.String makeToken()
Generates a string that clients have to echo back to demonstrate that they can reach the portion of the file system modifiable by the service. In non test environments should return an unguessable string.

createDbEnv

@Nonnull
protected abstract com.sleepycat.je.Environment createDbEnv(java.nio.file.Path dir)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
Creates a database environment rooted at the given directory. Test environments may create the database elsewhere.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSysProps

protected abstract java.util.Map<?,?> getSysProps()
Returns the system property map so that the service can tell clients how to restart it if it closes.

Returns the system environment map so that the service can tell clients how to restart it if it closes.
